For finals, it'd be better if we choose either a video or a paper. Doing both is a bit too much! Or video+essay would be good enough. In this course, I'm glad to learn the hero journey&story circle. Salute to filmmakers; it is hard work!
稱作文學與電影，卻常常只播放單一類型的電影，有點乏味，稍嫌可惜。
